title: Incorrect enablement of 'Build' popup action
description: The 'Build' popup action in the Java perspective context sensitive menu is always enabled, even if a build is not needed. This behavior is incorrect.
OB: The 'Build' action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, regardless of whether a build is necessary or not.
EB: The 'Build' action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should only be enabled when a build is required.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Java perspective. 
2. Right-click to open the context sensitive popup menu. 
3. Observe that the 'Build' action is always enabled, even if a build is not needed.
